page.title: 04Michael - a 6 yr. old's day.
page.content: I get up at quarter to eight, get dressed and have branflakes and coffee for my breakfast. The school uniform consists of grey pants, white shirt and a blue and yellow tie. My dad drives me to school in the car which takes about ten minutes. When we get to school we play until 9 o'clock. In school we do number work which is adding and finding the difference. In the morning we do religion and numberwork. From 10.40 till 10.55 we play in the playground. I like to play Super Man. I also do sound work and storytime. At 12 o'clock we go and play till 12.20 and then have our dinner. We have another play at 2.30 till 2.45. After 'choice time' we go home. At home after tea I watch 'Streethawk'. Then I go to bed at 8.30.
